description: Lingshen Chao is the type of techie that will someday create a robot that designs a program which builds a computer capable of curing the common cold! but, for now her research is limited to Electro-Umbrellas and water-proofing her classmate Chachamaru.An opportunity arises, though, for her to help right a wrong. All the tinkering in Mahora`s labs may finally pay-off if the newest project Lingshen has created with Satomi works like it should!
name: Chao Lingshen
